channel.title: Outreachy on Aishwarya Pant
channel.description: Recent content in Outreachy on Aishwarya Pant

item.title: You should apply for Outreachy!
item.description: For the last three weeks, I’ve been working as an Outreachy intern with Linux Kernel. Outreachy is an amazing three-month internship programme to get more underrepresented people to work on Free & Open Source Software (FOSS). It was started because of very low participation of women (less than 8%) in Google Summer of Code (GSoC). It’s completely remote and interns are paid $5,500 on completion of the project with an additional $500 stipend for attending conferences or meet-ups.
